attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When it comes to members of parliament wages, expenses and what they can claim for. I ask that any future claims should be submitted on the basis that it is morally right and not what they can legally get away with

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
